description: image/gif: don't write superfluous global color table

messages.text: Since the current implementation always writes a local color table (which supersedes the global color table), the GCT does not need to be written.
Can you run "hg sync; hg upload 11446043" for me? https://codereview.appspot.com/11446043/diff/4001/src/pkg/image/gif/writer.go says "error: old chunk mismatch".

> Can you run "hg sync; hg upload 11446043" for me?

> says "error: old chunk mismatch".
